data.message: There was a 1 star review given on our page, but there was no transaction ever done. The lady asked for a quote via Yelp, I guess she did not like the quote so she left a non protestable 1 star review. How is this possible to review a business you never patronized?   I feel there should be no way to review a business unless you have a transaction of some type. I would really like that review removed for our page ASAP. All my other reviews are 5 star from customers that we did business with.

replies.message: Thanks for the feedback, Leonard. We listen to all the feedback we get from the Facebook community. Please share your suggestion with us here: on.fb.me/1N2bhYs. -William
this was not intended to be feedback, I need this removed from our page.
Is there a real person here that can afford some help on this?
